item.title: Communism vs. Capitalism: See the Difference
item.description: Communism vs. Capitalism: See the Difference http://t.co/lVhRHIGm #twisters #tcot #WAR
item.content:encoded: Communism vs. Capitalism: See the Difference http://t.co/lVhRHIGm #twisters #tcot #WAR Sometimes a picture is worth much more than a thousand words. These photos are a stunning punch-in-the-gut example to people on the left who attack consumerism and capitalism; THIS is the difference that economic systems make. The work is by photographer Stefan Koppelkamm and was featured in an article in Der Speigel called A Massive Facelift for Eastern Germany. The before pictures show the scenery from the communist days and were taken in the early 1990s. The after pictures are from today, after unification. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: breitbart.com

item.title: Number of Americans Paid Not to Work Growing Faster than Number of Taxpayers
item.description: Number of Americans Paid Not to Work Growing Faster than Number of Taxpayers http://t.co/ytpaFTxA
item.content:encoded: Number of Americans Paid Not to Work Growing Faster than Number of Taxpayers http://t.co/ytpaFTxA The number of Americans drawing checks from the federal government via Social Security’s Supplemental Security Income Program swelled from 7.0 million in FY 2007 to an estimated 8.0 million in FY 2012, with the growth rate in the program doubling at the onset of the recession. This program is expected to cost taxpayers about $52 billion in FY 2012. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: breitbart.com

item.content:encoded: Brogan: Constraints: I was at a live performance the other night where Jacq sang and played with Girish, and I... http://t.co/oMSkuHdw I was at a live performance the other night where Jacq sang and played with Girish, and I had a great conversation with Reggie, the drummer for the night. (I am SO sorry that I don’t know your last name, Reggie.) We talked about the fact that his typical drum kit for events is usually like 30 or so pieces, but that he decided to go minimal for the event. He had a kick drum, a snare, a tom, two cymbals, and a Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Connecticut to become 17th state to legalize medical marijuana.
item.description: Connecticut will become the 17th state (+ DC) to legalize medical marijuana http://t.co/Q0wlaHOC
item.content:encoded: Connecticut will become the 17th state (+ DC) to legalize medical marijuana http://t.co/Q0wlaHOC Connecticut to become 17th state to legalize medical marijuana. | The AP has the story: “A bill legalizing marijuana for medical purposes has passed the Connecticut Senate. The state joins 16 others and the District of Columbia in enacting such legislation. State senators voted 21-to-13 in favor of the measure early Saturday, after nearly 10 hours of debate …Democratic Gov. Dannel P. Malloy, who has said he supports the measure, is expected to sign the legislation into law.” Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: thinkprogress.org

item.title: At least 23 people killed in Mexican border city as victims hanged, decapitated
item.description: Fox: At least 23 people killed in Mexican border city as victims hanged, decapitated: The bodies of 23 people we... http://t.co/4089EYmY
item.content:encoded: Fox: At least 23 people killed in Mexican border city as victims hanged, decapitated: The bodies of 23 people we... http://t.co/4089EYmY The bodies of 23 people were found hanging from a bridge or decapitated and dumped near city hall Friday in the border city of Nuevo Laredo, where drug cartels are fighting a bloody and escalating turf war. Link - Trackbacks
